welcome.title: Hello, I'm Shell virtual assistant and I can help you with the following topics or Input your question in one statement.

children.title: How do I become a Shell partner?

q0.0.1.title: For any partnership proposal, you can contact us at: MA-Partenariat@vivoenergy.com. Once your proposal has been studied, we will send you a response as soon as possible.

yes.title: Glad to have helped you. Shell virtual assistant is at your service. See you soon.

no.title: For a better asistance we invite you to contact us by going to the contact us section.
